formattedAddress: 26 Avenue A, New York, NY 10009, USA
adrFormatAddress: 26 Avenue A, New York, NY 10009-7601, USA

originalText.text:
I am a successful graduate of 3g I was maintenance about 1 n a half years at 100 mg and slow detoxed approx 6 to 8 months stepped off last know 10 mg and last 2 weeks asked not to know from 10 to probly 5mg and stayed clean over 20 years till injury and became dependent on pain meds ( wish I now lived near 3g cause currently since the complete reverse of years of all you wanted pain meds to which I always was careful not to keep increasing amounts of oxcontin and now in serious danger to get the very low minimum needs to avoid withdrawal and help my pain at least somewhat)
That said my experience was I was treated very well with great respectful treatment by all I wish I could remember all the Nurses ,R.A's but I will mention Linda , elenor or Elsie , my RA I can't rem name but was very helpful the boss then Mr Gorden Mainheardt , during my time I was in auto accident broke ankle 5 places well while in hosp my methadone was immediately arranged during my hospital stay and after in full leg cast Nurse and a RA delivered to the box to my apt And on top of that the RA even walked my German shepherd, I conly say  GOOD THINGS  I had my last dose methadone dec 25 1975 Thanks to all at 3G
Beth Israel’s Methadone Maintenance Treatment Program – Clinic 3G 429 2nd Avenue
New York, NY 10010
=

originalText.text: Slow and inept, clinic treats patients like human garbage, and dont deserve any respect, the counselors dismiss needs,  they can call you for billing issues, but wont call you to inform you of problem if you need late Clinic or guest doseing. The most rude and lazy clinicians I have ever encountered. I am an advocate for overdose prevention and medication assisted treatment, this clinic only wants to overcharge medicade and keep you in a state of anxiety, to keep you in relapse circles, they are the government dope boys of avenue A,  they disregard and avoid time sensitive issues. Leaving you under extreme anxiety and distress

originalText.text: Caring coynseling staff. Vocational, doctor, psychiatric and weekly groups available.  You get out of it what you put into it. Various modes of detox and maintenance also available.
